main event: An object, identified as a star or planet, appeared and disappeared rapidly while monitoring for UFOs at Ent AFB on March 21, 1966.
interesting points: The object was stationary and observed visually from the ground., The observation lasted 10 seconds., The object was visible through a break in the clouds., Its disappearance was confirmed by movement, checked after 10 seconds., The report suggests the object may have been mistaken for a star due to its appearance.
witness description: Two individuals observed the object at night in clear skies.
